attributes.action: commision an investigation into the feasibility of creating a set of planetary rings around the Earth, as part of the Olympic celebrations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Out of all the planets in our solar system, one of the most awesome has got to be Saturn.  Instantly recognisable, because it has rings.

Composed of dust and ice, it should be possible to artificially create a set around the Earth.

The symbol of the Olympic Games is a set of rings, so what better way to commemorate the 2012 games by giving the Earth its own set.

Not only that, but as shown in an animation by Roy Prol, they would really liven up Earth's sky.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
